text: The Dean campaign in 2002-04 was on the verge of turning a campaign into a social network. I was there. Here are my notes from the last night of the campaign, the Iowa Caucus in 2004. I was at Dean HQ in Burlington. I was blogging on Scripting News and on the main Dean weblog. We also rolled out Channel Dean that day, basically a linkblog managed by campaign people, linking to articles and blog posts their community would find interesting. These were all precursors to the social nets of today.
